member.summary: Back of device

member.summary: Front facing of device

member.name: T:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.MediaPickerModalPresentationStyle
member.summary: Specifies the media picker's modal presentation style. Only applies to iOS.

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.MediaPickerModalPresentationStyle.FullScreen
member.summary: This is the equivalent of presenting the media picker with UIKit.UIModalPresentationStyle.FullScreen style. Will remove the views of the underlying view controller when presenting the media picker. Only applies to iOS.

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.MediaPickerModalPresentationStyle.OverFullScreen
member.summary: This is the equivalent of presenting the media picker with UIKit.UIModalPresentationStyle.OverFullScreen style. Will keep the views of the underlying view controller when presenting the media picker. Only applies to iOS.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.MaxWidthHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the the max width or height of the image. The image will aspect resize to the MaxWidthHeight as the max size of the image height or width. This value is only used if PhotoSize is PhotoSize.MaxWidthHeight
member.value: The max width or height of the image.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.PhotoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the photo.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.CustomPhotoSize
member.summary: The custom photo size to use, 100 full size (same as Full), and 1 being smallest size at 1% of original Default is 100

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.CompressionQuality
member.summary: The compression quality to use, 0 is the maximum compression (worse quality), and 100 minimum compression (best quality) Default is 100

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.RotateImage
member.summary: Should the library rotate image according to received exif orientation. Set to true by default.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.SaveMetaData
member.summary: Saves metadate/exif data from the original file.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PickMediaOptions.ModalPresentationStyle
member.summary: Specifies the media picker's modal presentation style. Only applies to iOS. Defaults to FullScreen, which is the equivalent of using UIKit.UIModalPresentationStyle.FullScreen.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.AllowCropping
member.summary: Allow cropping on photos and trimming on videos If null will use default Photo: UWP cropping can only be disabled on full size Video: UWP trimming when disabled won't allow time limit to be set

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.DefaultCamera
member.summary: Default camera Should work on iOS and Windows, but not guaranteed on Android as not every camera implements it

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.MaxWidthHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the the max width or height of the image. The image will aspect resize to the MaxWidthHeight as the max size of the image height or width. This value is only used if PhotoSize is PhotoSize.MaxWidthHeight
member.value: The max width or height of the image.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.OverlayViewProvider
member.summary: Get or set for an OverlayViewProvider

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.PhotoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the photo.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.CustomPhotoSize
member.summary: The custom photo size to use, 100 full size (same as Full), and 1 being smallest size at 1% of original Default is 100

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.CompressionQuality
member.summary: The compression quality to use, 0 is the maximum compression (worse quality), and 100 minimum compression (best quality) Default is 100

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.Location
member.summary: Store provided location

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.RotateImage
member.summary: Should the library rotate image according to received exif orientation. Set to true by default.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.SaveMetaData
member.summary: Saves metadate/exif data from the original file.

member.name: P:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.StoreCameraMediaOptions.ModalPresentationStyle
member.summary: Specifies the media picker's modal presentation style. Only applies to iOS. Defaults to FullScreen, which is the equivalent of using UIKit.UIModalPresentationStyle.FullScreen.

member.name: T:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize
member.summary: Photo size enum.

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize.Small
member.summary: 25% of original

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize.Medium
member.summary: 50% of the original

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize.Large
member.summary: 75% of the original

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize.Full
member.summary: Untouched

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize.Custom
member.summary: Custom size between 1-100 Must set the CustomPhotoSize value Only applies to iOS and Android Windows will auto configure back to small, medium, large, and full

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.PhotoSize.MaxWidthHeight
member.summary: Use the Max Width or Height photo size. The property ManualSize must be set to a value. The MaxWidthHeight will be the max width or height of the image Currently this works on iOS and Android only. On Windows the PhotoSize will fall back to Full

member.name: T:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.VideoQuality

member.summary: Low

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.VideoQuality.Medium
member.summary: Medium

member.name: F:Plugin.Media.Abstractions.VideoQuality.High
member.summary: High
